pipeline_stats.name: abotyper
pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline for characterising the Human Blood Group and Red Cell Antigens using Oxford Nanopore third-generation sequencing data.

pipeline_stats.name: airrflow
pipeline_stats.description: B-cell and T-cell Adaptive Immune Receptor Repertoire (AIRR) sequencing analysis pipeline using the Immcantation framework

pipeline_stats.description: Amplicon sequencing analysis workflow using DADA2 and QIIME2

pipeline_stats.name: atacseq
pipeline_stats.description: ATAC-seq peak-calling and QC analysis pipeline

pipeline_stats.name: bacass
pipeline_stats.description: Simple bacterial assembly and annotation pipeline

pipeline_stats.name: bactmap
pipeline_stats.description: A mapping-based pipeline for creating a phylogeny from bacterial whole genome sequences

pipeline_stats.name: bamtofastq
pipeline_stats.description: Converts bam or cram files to fastq format and does quality control.

pipeline_stats.name: cageseq
pipeline_stats.description: CAGE-sequencing analysis pipeline with trimming, alignment and counting of CAGE tags.

pipeline_stats.name: callingcards
pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline for processing calling cards data

pipeline_stats.name: chipseq
pipeline_stats.description: ChIP-seq peak-calling, QC and differential analysis pipeline.

pipeline_stats.name: circdna
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for the identification of extrachromosomal circular DNA (ecDNA) from Circle-seq, WGS, and ATAC-seq data that were generated from cancer and other eukaryotic cells.

pipeline_stats.name: circrna
pipeline_stats.description: circRNA quantification, differential expression analysis and miRNA target prediction of RNA-Seq data

pipeline_stats.name: clipseq
pipeline_stats.description: CLIP sequencing analysis pipeline for QC, pre-mapping, genome mapping, UMI deduplication, and multiple peak-calling options.

pipeline_stats.name: coproid
pipeline_stats.description: Coprolite host Identification pipeline

pipeline_stats.name: createpanelrefs
pipeline_stats.description: Generate Panel of Normals, models or other similar references from lots of samples

pipeline_stats.name: createtaxdb
pipeline_stats.description: Parallelised and automated construction of metagenomic classifier databases of different tools

pipeline_stats.name: crisprseq
pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline for the analysis of CRISPR edited data. It allows the evaluation of the quality of gene editing experiments using targeted next generation sequencing (NGS) data (`targeted`) as well as the discovery of important genes from knock-out or activation CRISPR-Cas9 screens using CRISPR pooled DNA (`screening`).

pipeline_stats.name: cutandrun
pipeline_stats.description: Analysis pipeline for CUT&RUN and CUT&TAG experiments that includes QC, support for spike-ins, IgG controls, peak calling and downstream analysis.

pipeline_stats.name: datasync
pipeline_stats.description: nf-core/datasync is a system operation pipeline that provides several workflows for handling system operation / automation tasks

pipeline_stats.name: deepmodeloptim
pipeline_stats.description: Stochastic Testing and Input Manipulation for Unbiased Learning Systems

pipeline_stats.name: demo
pipeline_stats.description: nf-core/demo is a simple nf-core style bioinformatics pipeline for workshops and demos.

pipeline_stats.name: demultiplex
pipeline_stats.description: Demultiplexing pipeline for sequencing data

pipeline_stats.name: denovotranscript
pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline for de novo transcriptome assembly of paired-end short reads from bulk RNA-seq

pipeline_stats.name: detaxizer
pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline to identify (and remove) certain sequences from raw genomic data. Default taxon to identify (and remove) is Homo sapiens. Removal is optional.

pipeline_stats.name: diaproteomics
pipeline_stats.description: Automated quantitative analysis of DIA proteomics mass spectrometry measurements.

pipeline_stats.name: differentialabundance
pipeline_stats.description: Differential abundance analysis for feature/ observation matrices from platforms such as RNA-seq

pipeline_stats.name: diseasemodulediscovery
pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline for network-based disease module identification.

pipeline_stats.name: drop
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline to find aberrant events in RNA-Seq data, useful for diagnosis of rare disorders

pipeline_stats.name: drugresponseeval
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for testing drug response prediction models in a statistically and biologically sound way.

pipeline_stats.name: dualrnaseq
pipeline_stats.description: Analysis of Dual RNA-seq data - an experimental method for interrogating host-pathogen interactions through simultaneous RNA-seq.

pipeline_stats.name: eager
pipeline_stats.description: A fully reproducible and state-of-the-art ancient DNA analysis pipeline

pipeline_stats.name: epitopeprediction
pipeline_stats.description: A bioinformatics best-practice analysis pipeline for epitope prediction and annotation

pipeline_stats.name: evexplorer
pipeline_stats.description: nf-core/evexplorer is a pipeline for analyzing RNA data from extracellular vesicles, compatible with technologies such as nextflex, comboSeq, and ONT with further support forthcoming. evexplorer handles QC, expressed region detection, library size normalization and Differential RNA Expression (DRE)

pipeline_stats.name: fastqrepair
pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline that can be used to recover corrupted FASTQ.gz files, drop or fix uncompliant reads, remove unpaired reads, and settles reads that became disordered

pipeline_stats.name: fastquorum
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline to produce consensus reads using unique molecular indexes/barcodes (UMIs)

pipeline_stats.name: fetchngs
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline to fetch metadata and raw FastQ files from public databases

pipeline_stats.name: funcscan
pipeline_stats.description: (Meta-)genome screening for functional and natural product gene sequences

pipeline_stats.name: genomeannotator
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for the identification of (coding) gene structures in draft genomes.

pipeline_stats.description: Assembly and scaffolding of haploid / unphased genomes from long ONT or PacBio HiFi reads

pipeline_stats.name: genomeqc
pipeline_stats.description: Compare the quality of multiple genomes, along with their annotations.

pipeline_stats.name: genomeskim
pipeline_stats.description: QC and filtering of genome skims, followed by organelle assembly and/or genome analysis

pipeline_stats.description: Precision HLA typing from next-generation sequencing data

pipeline_stats.description: Genome annotation with PacBio Iso-Seq. Takes raw subreads as input, generate Full Length Non Chemiric (FLNC) sequences and produce a bed annotation.

pipeline_stats.name: kmermaid
pipeline_stats.description: k-mer similarity analysis pipeline

pipeline_stats.description: Best-practice analysis pipeline for mapping reads to a (large) collections of genomes

pipeline_stats.name: mcmicro

pipeline_stats.description: Assembly and annotation of metatranscriptomic or metagenomic data for prokaryotic, eukaryotic and viruses.

pipeline_stats.description: Process methylation data from Illumina arrays. Pre-processing, quality checks, confounder check and DMPs (differentially methylated positions) and DMRs (differentially methylated regions). Optionally estimates cell type composition and adjusts data for it.

pipeline_stats.description: Extract methylation calls from long reads (ONT/ PacBio)

pipeline_stats.description: Methylation (Bisulfite-Sequencing) analysis pipeline using Bismark or bwa-meth + MethylDackel

pipeline_stats.description: Identify and quantify MHC eluted peptides from mass spectrometry raw data

pipeline_stats.description: A-Z analysis of mitochondrial NGS data

pipeline_stats.description: MNase-seq analysis pipeline using BWA and DANPOS2.

pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline for processing Molecular Cartography data from Resolve Bioscience (combinatorial FISH)

pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline to run and systematically evaluate Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) methods.

pipeline_stats.description: Protein 3D structure prediction pipeline

pipeline_stats.description: Variant-calling pipeline for Restriction site-associated DNA sequencing (RADseq).

pipeline_stats.name: rangeland
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for remotely sensed imagery. The pipeline processes satellite imagery alongside auxiliary data in multiple steps to arrive at a set of trend files related to land-cover changes.

pipeline_stats.name: raredisease
pipeline_stats.description: Call and score variants from WGS/WES of rare disease patients.

pipeline_stats.name: rarevariantburden
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for performing consistent summary count based rare variant burden test, which is useful when we only have sequenced cases data. For example, we can compare the cases against public summary count data, such as gnomAD.

pipeline_stats.description: A pipeline to simulate sequencing reads, such as Amplicon, Target Capture, Metagenome, and Whole genome data.

pipeline_stats.description: nf-core pipeline for comparative analysis of ortholog predictions

pipeline_stats.description: QC pipeline that monitors mass spectrometer performance in ribonucleoside analysis

pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for the analysis of ribosome profiling, or Ribo-seq (also named ribosome footprinting) data.

pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for RNA and DNA integrated analysis for somatic mutation detection

pipeline_stats.description: Single-cell/nuclei pipeline for data derived from Oxford Nanopore and 10X Genomics

pipeline_stats.name: scrnaseq

pipeline_stats.description: QC pipeline to inspect your sequences

pipeline_stats.description: Nextflow version of Sopa - spatial omics pipeline and analysis

pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for processing spatially-resolved gene counts with spatial coordinates and image data. Designed for 10x Genomics Visium transcriptomics.

pipeline_stats.name: spinningjenny
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline for simulating the first industrial revolution using Agent Based Models.

pipeline_stats.name: stableexpression
pipeline_stats.description: Pipeline dedicated to finding the most stable genes among a single or multiple expression dataset(s). It is useful in particular for finding the most suitable RT-qPCR reference genes for a specific species.

pipeline_stats.name: taxprofiler
pipeline_stats.description: Highly parallelised multi-taxonomic profiling of shotgun short- and long-read metagenomic data

pipeline_stats.description: Analysis pipeline for the identification of viral integration events in genomes using a chimeric read approach.

pipeline_stats.description: Detect iSNV and construct whole viral genomes from metagenomic samples
